comment: The Allies would tell freshly captured Axis soldiers, 'Enjoy the war while you can - the peace will be terrible'. Four times more Germans died in the surrender of Germany than during the entire war.
amr:
# ::snt The Allies would tell freshly captured Axis soldiers, 'Enjoy the war while you can - the peace will be terrible'. Four times more Germans died in the surrender of Germany than during the entire war.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / military
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Allies"))
            :ARG1 (e / enjoy-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (w / war)
                  :time (p / possible-01)
                  :ARG1-of p
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / terrible-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / peace))))
            :ARG2 (s / soldier
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Axis"))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / capture-01
                        :manner (f / fresh-04))))
      :snt2 (d / die-01
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :mod (c4 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Germany"))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                        :ARG3 (t3 / times
                              :quant 4)
                        :ARG4 (d2 / die-01
                              :time (w2 / war
                                    :mod (e2 / entire)))))
            :time (s2 / surrender-01
                  :ARG0 c4
                  :ARG1 c4)))

comment: All you can do is swear at people to make a point, why not develop your opinion with actual facts that can be substantiated
amr:

(p / possible-01
      :ARG1 (d / do-02
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / swear-02
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person)
                  :purpose (p3 / point-04
                        :ARG0 y))
            :mod (a / all))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :concession (d2 / develop-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (o / opine-01
                        :ARG0 y))
            :ARG2 (f / fact
                  :ARG1-of (a3 / actual-02)
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / substantiate-01
                        :ARG1-of (p4 / possible-01)))))
